name: Pomeranian Activity
description:
POMERANIAN ACTIVITY
You play as a small Pomeranian, left home alone before a birthday celebration. The drool worthy birthday cake is of course your main objective. Explore and trash the apartment in order to reach your goal.

CONTROLS
Use WASD to move, SPACE to jump and Q to bark. 

TO PLAY
Download - unzipp (Extract) and press the "1PomeranianActivity" file.
